question: Will President Biden say “Trump” during his August 16 speech + Q&A?
description: This is a market on whether President Biden will say “Trump” during his August 16 speech + Q&A, scheduled to take place at 3:45 PM ET. This market only concerns the speech and the following Q&A, not later speeches in the day. The market will resolve to “Yes” if Biden says “Trump” during the speech and/or Q&A, as verified by live video and other credible sources. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.” References to Trump will not count - only the word “Trump” will be considered. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will there be 19 or more named storms during the Atlantic hurricane season?
description:
In Response to Trader Inquiry: This market will resolve according to NOAA’s list of named storms from the Atlantic hurricane season (https://www.nhc.noaa.gov/data/tcr/) AND their data on individual storms (e.g. https://www.nhc.noaa.gov/data/tcr/AL012021_Ana.pdf). Note, only storms that are active during the June 1 - November 30 period will be counted, meaning Ana and storms that form in December are excluded.

This is a market on whether the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) will designate 19 or more named storms during the 2021 Atlantic hurricane season, a period lasting from June 1 to November 30. Note, storms that form before the period but are active during it are included in NOAA’s count. This market will resolve according to NOAA’s list of named storms during the Atlantic hurricane season: https://www.nhc.noaa.gov/data/tcr/. This market will resolve to “Yes” if NOAA names 19 or more storms during the Atlantic hurricane season. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.” In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will The Queen's Gambit win the Emmy Award for Best Limited Series?
description: This is a market on whether The Queen's Gambit produced by Netflix will win the 2021 Emmy Award for Outstanding Limited Or Anthology Series at the 73rd Primetime Emmy Award, scheduled to take place on Sunday, September 19, 2021. This market will resolve to “Yes” if The Queen's Gambit wins the award for Outstanding Limited Or Anthology Series at the 73rd Primetime Emmy Awards, or “No” if it does not win the award for this category. If for any reason the 73rd Primetime Emmy Awards are delayed or the announcement of a winner is delayed, market resolution will be delayed until a winner for Outstanding Limited Or Anthology Series is announced. The resolution source will be the television broadcast of the awards, and if necessary, the Emmy's website (https://www.emmys.com/awards/nominees-winners/2021/outstanding-miniseries). In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will the Liberal Party win a majority in the 2021 Canadian federal election?
description: This is a market on whether the Liberal Party of Canada will win a majority of parliament seats during the federal election scheduled to be held on September 20, 2021. A majority of parliament seats is defined as any number of seats greater than 169. This market will resolve according to official election results at https://www.elections.ca/home.aspx. This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Liberal Party of Canada wins a majority of seats, and “No” otherwise. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will Ethereum switch to Proof-of-Stake (EIP-3675) by February 22, 2022?
description: This is a market on whether EIP-3675 will be implemented on Ethereum prior to the resolution date, February 22, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET. This market will resolve to "Yes" if the EIP-3675 is implemented prior to the resolution date, and "No" otherwise. Being implemented on a testnet will not suffice for this market to resolve to "Yes." EIP-3675 must be implemented on the Ethereum mainnet. Only EIP-3675 will be considered for this market. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

events.title: When will Ethereum Merge to Proof-of-Stake?
events.description:
This is a market group on when "The Merge" will occur on the Ethereum mainnet as described in EIP-3675 (or any successor to EIP-3675), transitioning the Ethereum blockchain to proof-of-stake.

Note that forks to the execution layer and the consensus layer implementing EIP-3675 will not have any impact on the market resolution. Only the actual occurrence of The Merge will be considered.
